name: Bata
description:
Enter the mind of a child, lost in despair, and decide how to deal with the emotions that have manifested within them. How you deal with these emotions will determine the abilities that Bata can gain and help them find their way out.

Note: This game was produced as part of the San Jose State University Animation/Illustration Thesis Program. 

Notable Bugs:

  • Music may sometimes overlap
  • During scripted events, Bata will kick up a continuous dust cloud
  • Interactables require the player to jump to interact
  • Enemies sometimes snap to incorrect position when embracing
